messages.title: There's still time ... And your vote is vital
Your vote really matters
messages.content: It's a two horse race between John Pugh and the Conservative candidate in Southport. Just a few votes will separate the Lib Dems and the Conservatives. Labour always come a poor third in Southport.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's a two horse race between John Pugh and the Conservative candidate in Southport. Just a few votes will separate the Lib Dems and the Conservatives. Labour always come a poor third in Southport.

images.caption: 2005 General Election Result - Lib Dem 46%, Con 37%, Lab 13%

leaflet.additionalNotes: Polling stations are open till 10.00 pm. You do not need a card to vote.
